00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00033   * @{
00034   */
00035

00043 
00044 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 void GPIO_Configuration(void);
00046 void GPIO_InputReadBit(void);
00047 void GPIO_InputReadData(void);
00048 
00049 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00051   * @brief  Main program.
00052   * @retval None
00053   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00054 int main(void)
00055 {
00056   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00057   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00058 
00059   GPIO_Configuration();
00060 
00061   while (1)
00062   {
00063 
00064     GPIO_InputReadBit();
00065 
00066     GPIO_InputReadData();
00067 
00068   }
00069 }
00070 
00071 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00072   * @brief  Configure the GPIO as input mode.
00073   * @retval None
00074   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00075 void GPIO_Configuration(void)
00076 {
00077   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00078     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00079     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00080     CKCUClock.Bit.PB = 1;
00081     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00082   }
00083 
00084   { /* Configure GPIO as input mode                                                                         */
00085 
00086     /* Configure AFIO mode as GPIO                                                                          */
00087     AFIO_GPxConfig(GPIO_PB, AFIO_PIN_1, AFIO_FUN_GPIO);
00088 
00089     /* Configure GPIO pull resistor                                                                         */
00090     GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_1, GPIO_PR_DOWN);
00091 
00092     /* Configure GPIO direction as input                                                                    */
00093     GPIO_DirectionConfig(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_1, GPIO_DIR_IN);
00094 
00095     /* Enable input function for read                                                                       */
00096     GPIO_InputConfig(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_1, ENABLE);
00097   }
00098 }
00099 
00100 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00101   * @brief  GPIO Read bit test
00102   * @retval None
00103   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00104 void GPIO_InputReadBit(void)
00105 {
00106   FlagStatus InputStatus = RESET;
00107 
00108   InputStatus = GPIO_ReadInBit(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_1);
00109 
00110   if (InputStatus == SET)
00111   {
00112     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00113   }
00114   else
00115   {
00116     HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED1);
00117   }
00118 }
00119 
00120 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00121   * @brief  GPIO Read data test
00122   * @retval None
00123   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00124 void GPIO_InputReadData(void)
00125 {
00126   u16 uInputData = 0;
00127 
00128   uInputData = GPIO_ReadInData(HT_GPIOB);
00129 
00130   if (uInputData & GPIO_PIN_1)
00131   {
00132     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00133   }
00134   else
00135   {
00136     HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED2);
00137   }
00138 }
00139 
00140 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)

00147 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)

00150      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00151      Debug message can be added here.
00152      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00153   */
00154

00156   {
00157   }
00158 }
00159 #endif
